description:
Samantha Sin is back and takes on the 5th ranked Ariel X. Samantha has
taken a liking to US and hopes to become a top ranked contender before the
season is over.
Unfortunately for Samantha, she is completely schooled on the mat. The
painful lesson she learned once before becomes fresh in her mind again, as her
face is brutally slammed into the mat, is that there is nothing easy about
wrestling at Ultimate Surrender. She thought wrestling the 5th ranked Ariel
X would be a cake walk compared to Vendetta, never has someone been so
wrong.
title: Ariel X "The Assassin" (5-2)
